name: Super Smash T.V.
overview: Congratulations! You're the next lucky contestant on the game show with the ultimate in prizes....YOUR LIFE! Pick 6 futuristic weapons and defeat hordes of cyborg mutants, power orbs, assault tanks and the 30-ton mutoid man! Features: 1 & 2 player simultaneous action; 2 controller action giving 360° firepower. Based on the Williams/Bally® arcade smash.
